## Matrix creation

### Creation: vector cases

For the random part, one is expected to run a command like
```{python}
import numpy as np
rng = np.random.default_rng(12)
```
before anything, to call the generator `rng`.




| Code | Result|
| ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
| 
<pre> x = np.zeros(9) </pre>
                      | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/create-zeros-1.svg" width="200px"></image>   |
| <pre> x = np.ones(9)</pre>                            | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/create-ones-1.svg" width="200px"></image>    |
| <pre> x = np.full(9, 0.5)</pre>                       | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/create-full-1.svg" width="200px"></image>    |
| <pre> x = np.array([0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0])</pre> | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/create-list-1.svg" width="200px"></image>    |
| <pre> x = np.arange(9)</pre>                          | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/create-arange-1.svg" width="200px"></image>  |
| <pre> x = rng.random(9)</pre>                         | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/create-uniform-1.svg" width="200px"></image> |

## Matrix reshaping
We start here with
```Python
M = np.zeros((3, 4))
M[2, 2] = 1
```

<image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M.svg" width="200px"></image> 


| Code                            | Result                                                                                 |
| ------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| <pre>M = M.reshape(4, 3)</pre>  | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(4,3).svg" width="200px"></image>  |
| <pre>M = M.reshape(12, 1)</pre> | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(12,1).svg" width="200px"></image> |
| <pre>M = M.reshape(1, 12)</pre> | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(1,12).svg" width="200px"></image> |
| <pre>M = M.reshape(6, 2)</pre>  | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(6,2).svg" width="200px"></image>  |
| <pre>M = M.reshape(2, 6)</pre>  | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/reshape-M-reshape(2,6).svg" width="200px"></image>  |



## Slicing

Start from a zero matrix:
```Python
M = np.zeros((5, 9))
```

<image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M.svg" width="200px"></image> 


| Code                         | Result                                                                            |
| ---------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| <pre>M[...] = 1 </pre>       | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[...].svg" width="200px"></image>       |
| <pre>M[:, ::2] = 1</pre>     | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[:,::2].svg" width="200px"></image>     |
| <pre>M[::2, :] = 1</pre>     | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[::2,:].svg" width="200px"></image>     |
| <pre>M[1, 1] = 1</pre>       | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[1,1].svg" width="200px"></image>       |
| <pre>M[:, 0] = 1</pre>       | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[:,0].svg" width="200px"></image>       |
| <pre>M[0, :] = 1</pre>       | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[0,:].svg" width="200px"></image>       |
| <pre>M[2:, 2:] = 1</pre>     | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[2:,2:].svg" width="200px"></image>     |
| <pre>M[:-2, :-2] = 1</pre>   | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[:-2,:-2].svg" width="200px"></image>   |
| <pre>M[2:4, 2:4] = 1</pre>   | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[2:4,2:4].svg" width="200px"></image>   |
| <pre>M[::2, ::2] = 1</pre>   | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[::2,::2].svg" width="200px"></image>   |
| <pre>M[3::2, 3::2] = 1</pre> | <image src = "../ScipyNumpy/CheatSheet/figures/slice-M[3::2,3::2].svg" width="200px"></image> |
